This document covers standards and guidelines on writing PKGBUILDs for init scripts. eg openrcAUR

sections.title: Package naming
sections.content:
For init scripts, use modulename-init.

example bluetooth-openrcAUR jellyfin-runitAUR

sections.title: Architecture
sections.content:
See PKGBUILD#arch.

A init script should be architecture-independent.

sections.title: Depends
sections.content: all scripts should depend on it's init ie apparmor-openrcAUR requires openrc for it to work
